title: Hard II Love, Easy II Beef
itunes:title: Hard II Love, Easy II Beef
description:
MON 9/19 - Usher stops by The Breakfast Club after the release of his new album "Hard II Love" and we talk everything from longevity & mentorship to Chilli and SnapChat pics. Then we discuss two guys who find it very hard to love each other: The Game & Meek Mill. Another season, another beef for Nicki's boo.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
